channel.title: misc on Biologically Plausible Programming
channel.description: Recent content in misc on Biologically Plausible Programming

item.title: Creating a Hexagon Sticker with R in Minutes
item.description: I have recently released new versions of manymodelr and mde, R packages you may or may not have heard of. One common feature of many R packages is a hexagon shaped sticker that often summarises the goals of the package and/or gives an idea of the developer’s philosophy. I am, as those who know me well might tell you, not the best of artists. I however, have always marveled at these beautiful stickers in others’ packages and wished to create one myself.

item.title: How to add a custom Kaggle Favicon to Hugo's Blackburn Theme
item.description: In this short article, I show how I added a Kaggle favicon to the site. Prerequisites: R packages magrittr magick Why did I need to create a custom favicon? I admittedly do not use Kaggle as much as I used to a year or so ago, mainly because I’ve found the site to be less enjoyable but that’s a post for another day. The real reason for the need to create a custom icon was the desire to include Kaggle under the side bar.
